item.title: Learnable Embedding Space for Efficient Neural Architecture Compression
item.description:
Shengcao Cao*, Xiaofang Wang* and Kris M. Kitani
ICLR 2019 - We propose a method to incrementally learn an embedding space over the domain of network architectures, to enable the careful selection of architectures for evaluation during compressed architecture search. To learn more about this work, please refer to our paper and code.
